product.longDescription: Vibrantly colored, deep blush, medium-large berries. Sweet, intense flavor. Cone-shaped berries. Everbearing or fall-bearing type plants. Double Gold can be grown as both a floricane (summer) and primocane (fall) producer. Resistant to Phytophthora root rot and most of the common leaf diseases. Bred by Cornell University, Geneva, New York. Grows best in Zones 5–7. 1 Unit = 1 plant.
product.shortDescription: New! Unique, everbearing variety with excellent flavor.

New

Double Gold Raspberry Plants

Product ID:4254.134254

Vibrantly colored, deep blush, medium-large berries. Sweet, intense flavor. Cone-shaped berries. Everbearing or fall-bearing type plants. Double Gold can be grown as both a floricane (summer) and primocane (fall) producer. Resistant to Phytophthora root rot and most of the common leaf diseases. Bred by Cornell University, Geneva, New York. Grows best in Zones 5–7. 1 Unit = 1 plant.
